name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
description: Often called the King of Dinosaurs, this massive therapod is one of the most recognizable predators in history, known for its massive skull and powerful jaws.

geologicalPeriod.name: Cretaceous
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Warm and humid with high sea levels and diverse flora.

name: Triceratops
description: A large herbivore distinguished by its massive frill and three horns, which were likely used for defense against predators like the T-Rex.

geologicalPeriod.name: Cretaceous
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Warm and humid with high sea levels and diverse flora.

name: Stegosaurus
description: Easily identified by the double row of kite-shaped plates along its back and the four long spikes on its tail, known as the thagomizer.

geologicalPeriod.name: Jurassic
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Humid and subtropical, allowing for the growth of giant conifers and ferns.

name: Velociraptor
description: A small but agile predator, possessing a deadly sickle-shaped claw on each hind foot. Unlike movie depictions, they were feathered and turkey-sized.

geologicalPeriod.name: Cretaceous
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Warm and humid with high sea levels and diverse flora.

name: Brachiosaurus
description: A gigantic sauropod with longer front legs than back legs, giving it a giraffe-like stance to reach high vegetation.

geologicalPeriod.name: Jurassic
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Humid and subtropical, allowing for the growth of giant conifers and ferns.

name: Coelophysis
description: One of the earliest known dinosaur genera. It was a small, lightly built, carnivorous biped that lived in the Late Triassic.

geologicalPeriod.name: Triassic
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Hot and dry with vast deserts and seasonal monsoons.

name: Ankylosaurus
description: A living tank, covered in heavy armor plating and wielding a massive bone club at the end of its tail for defense.

geologicalPeriod.name: Cretaceous
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Warm and humid with high sea levels and diverse flora.

name: Spinosaurus
description: The largest carnivorous dinosaur known, easily recognized by the massive sail on its back. It was likely semi-aquatic.

geologicalPeriod.name: Cretaceous
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Warm and humid with high sea levels and diverse flora.

name: Allosaurus
description: The apex predator of the Jurassic period. It had a massive skull but a surprisingly weak bite force, using its head like a hatchet.

geologicalPeriod.name: Jurassic
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Humid and subtropical, allowing for the growth of giant conifers and ferns.

name: Parasaurolophus
description: A duck-billed dinosaur famous for the long, curved crest on its head, which was used for visual display and producing loud, low-frequency sounds.

geologicalPeriod.name: Cretaceous
geologicalPeriod.climateDescription: Warm and humid with high sea levels and diverse flora.
